game.name: The Grant Grover Anthology
game.categories: Single-player, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: In Neo Naarm in the 22nd century, augmentation technology has run amok. Combining deduction, visual novel and point and click gameplay, play as Grant Grover, private detective, one of the only remaining citizens without augmentations, as he solves crimes across the city.
